comments:
The "Use internal Web browser" option is grayed out in Preferences>General> Web Browser.

when trying to open a view which uses the internal browser it get (in this case from myeclipse thirdparty view) :

You need to check your Linux installation (go to SWT home page at http://eclipse.org/swt and check for FAQ). Your Linux setup must support embedded Mozilla browser.

Could not reproduce this NPE by forcing the BrowserViewer into the catch block where it deals with a SWT.ERROR_NO_HANDLES situation. This is what happens when the OS is not configured correctly as in this bug report.
Closing as WORKSFORME, please reopen if you see this problem again.
